title: add wards placed to game stats
body: Pretty simple request, add a Misc. after game stat for number of wards placed by each player.  I think this simple act would change player warding behavior for the better. What do you think?

replies.body:
You go to the advanced stats page that opens in a web browser you can see the wards placed stat.

In both the overview and the stats page sections.
This. I feel like adding wards placed to the in-client stats would just get way too crowded.

Being able to see warded areas on the map overview after the game would be incredibly helpful for learning effective warding. However, I can see it be useless because of all the ward jumping. Get a Lee Sin in the game and you'll have wards in your base.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

the concept is simple, the actual do-so isnt

so just go to the advanced tab to see them
